constraint: The date shall contain either no hyphens, one hyphen or more than two hyphens.
There must be at least one hyphen and the part before the hyphen shall not be a number between 0 and 2025.
There must be at least two hyphens and the part after the first hyphen but before the second hyphen shall not be a number between 1 and 12.
result: (and (>= (str.count s "-") 2) (not (and (str.prefixof (str.substr s (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1) (- (str.indexof s "-" (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)) (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1))) "0") (<= (str.to.int (str.substr s (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1) (- (str.indexof s "-" (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)) (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)))) 12))))

constraint: There must be at least two hyphens an d the part after the second hyphen shall not be a number between 1 and 31.
result: (and (>= (str.count s "-") 2) (not (and (str.prefixof (str.substr s (+ (str.indexof s "-" (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)) 1) (- (str.len s) (+ (str.indexof s "-" (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)) 1))) "0") (<= (str.to.int (str.substr s (+ (str.indexof s "-" (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)) 1) (- (str.len s) (+ (str.indexof s "-" (+ (str.indexof s "-" 0) 1)) 1)))) 31))))
